## General

- Heletes' Forge (Eastern Highlands) and Nicanor (The Frozen Citadel) no longer grant player vision.
- The minimap has been updated to only display player heroes, player banks, town wayfinding markers, and select NPCs/Locations.
- `-info` now displays the hero's total base stats and the stat cap.

### Typos & Typesetting

- Forge Ares' Bloodthirsty Spear
- Forge Thundering Hammer of Zeus
- Forge Searing Flame of Prometheus
- Forge Immortal Armor of Hephaestus
- Forge Blazing Sword of Helios
- Forge Towering Shield of Athena
- Thespian Halberd
- Shadowstrike (Assassin)
- Cleave (Item ability)

## Bug Fixes

- Mana Shield [Item Ability] now correctly mitigates the damage received, not the damage dealt.
- Grievious Wounds (Midas) and Striking the Heart (Gaiana) now retains their intended icon.
- Chimaera's fireball mechanic should no longer fail due to game time.
- Fountain of Restoration now restores mana to Warrior classes.
- Statuette of the Tyche now faces towards the Obelisk of Poseidon again.
- Auras granted from item abilities now persist through transformations.
  - This affects Form Change (Druid) downstream.

## Items

- Items now have models color-coded models that match their rarity.

### Abilities

**Mana Shield**

Activate to convert 20% of your current mana into a post-mitigation damage shield for 5 seconds. Cooldown: 60 seconds. ⇒ Spend 20% of your current mana to create a post-mitigation damage shield of equivalent value on an ally for 5 seconds.

> Affects Midnight Cloak and Amphirite's Cloak downstream

**Adamantium Set**

- Whenever you equip two or more items with Adamantium Set:  
• 2+ Items: Increases Resist by 15. Grants Critical Strike IV.  
• 3 Items: Increases Strength by 45 and Resist by 20. Grants Block II.
- Previously, "3 Items: Increase your Attack Damage by 250 and Armor by 50."

> Affects Adamantium Lance, Helm, and Shield downstream.

**Devotion Aura I**
Armor: 20 ⇒ 15.

> Affects Shield of Warding downstream.

**Bloodthirsty**

Removed from the game.

> Affects Deathbringer and Night Regalia downstream

**Cleave I** / **Cleave II**

Your auto-attacks also deal 0.4 / 0.7 Primary Attribute physical damage in a 200 AoE of the target. Melee only. ⇒ Your auto-attacks also deal 1.0 / 1.5 bonus Primary Attribute physical damage in a 200 AoE of the target. Melee only.

> Affects Deathchill Blade, Deathchill Greatsword, and Red Dragonscale Ring of Serious Addiction downstream

## Forces of Hell

- Cerebus' pull mechanic now uses player colour to print the target player's name.
- Helius' fire blast mechanic now uses player colour to print the target player's name.
- Medusa's gate timer reduced to 10 seconds (from 20 seconds).
- Updated Uranus' the transformation mechanic. If you phase skip, Uranus will remain in his ground form.

### Gaea

- Gaea's gate timer reduced to 50 seconds (from 60 seconds).
- Updated the transformation mechanic.
- There is no longer a one second delay in sequentially spawning (a) two Earth Guardians; (b) Water and Nature Guardians.
- No longer drops *Eris' Golden Apple of Discord*.
